<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> &lt; NumberOfSections; ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlight">        P2CurrentAlignment = std::max(P2CurrentAlignment,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      (Is64Bit ? O.getSection64(LC, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>).align</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                               : O.getSection(LC, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>).align));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">      P2CurrentAlignment =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a57d2f9ee99e9e68cff564d0d579c8163">llvm::countr&#95;zero</a>(Is64Bit ? O.getSegment64LoadCommand(LC).vmaddr</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    : O.getSegmentLoadCommand(LC).vmaddr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight">    P2MinAlignment = std::min(P2MinAlignment, P2CurrentAlignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// return a value &gt;= 4 byte aligned, and less than MachO MaxSectionAlignment</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::max(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint32&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(2),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::min(P2MinAlignment, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint32&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/object/machouniversalbinary/#ad0ac2adcfd6be41ed526a12ddd2215d2">MachOUniversalBinary::MaxSectionAlignment</a>)));</span></CodeLine>
